classes.bookClassToSeeHere: Book a class below to see it here!

Book "{{className}}" on {{date}} at {{time}}?

classes.addedToWaitlist: You've been added to the waitlist at position #{{position}}.
classes.removedFromWaitlist: You've been removed from the waitlist.
classes.classBookedSuccessfully: Your class has been booked successfully!
classes.noBookingsDesc: You haven't booked any classes yet. Start by booking your first class!
classes.subscriptionRequiredMessage: You need an active subscription plan to book classes. Please contact reception to purchase a plan.
classes.subscriptionRequiredWaitlistMessage: You need an active subscription plan to join waitlists. Please contact reception to purchase a plan.
classes.needSubscriptionToJoinWaitlist: You need an active subscription plan to join waitlists. Please contact reception to purchase a plan.

booking.cannotCancelDesc:
Sorry, you cannot cancel this booking. Time remaining: {{timeRemaining}}.

Our policy requires cancellations to be made at least 2 hours before the class starts.
booking.bookingCancelledWithPromotion: Your booking has been cancelled and your credit refunded. Someone from the waitlist has been promoted!
booking.bookingCancelledSuccess: Your booking has been cancelled and your credit has been refunded to your account.
booking.leaveWaitlistConfirm: Are you sure you want to leave the waitlist for {{className}}?
booking.unableToLeaveWaitlist: Unable to leave waitlist. Please try again.

notifications.classReminderBody: Your {{className}} class with {{instructorName}} starts in {{minutes}} minutes!
notifications.waitlistPromotedBody: A spot opened up in {{className}} on {{date}} at {{time}}. You have been automatically booked!
notifications.waitlistJoinedBody: You've been added to the waitlist for {{className}} on {{date}} at {{time}}. Your position: #{{position}}
notifications.classAssignmentBody: You've been assigned to {{className}} with {{instructorName}} on {{date}} at {{time}}.
notifications.classBookedBody: Your booking for {{className}} with {{instructorName}} is confirmed for {{date}} at {{time}}.
notifications.classCancelledByStudioBody: Sorry, {{className}} on {{date}} at {{time}} has been cancelled. You'll be notified about replacement classes.
notifications.instructorChangeBody: The instructor for {{className}} on {{date}} has changed from {{oldInstructor}} to {{newInstructor}}.
notifications.classTimeChangeBody: {{className}} on {{date}} has been moved from {{oldTime}} to {{newTime}}.
notifications.subscriptionExpiringBody: Your {{planName}} subscription will expire on {{expiryDate}}. Renew to continue booking classes.
notifications.subscriptionExpiredBody: Your {{planName}} subscription has expired. Visit reception to renew.
notifications.classFullBody: {{className}} on {{date}} at {{time}} is full. You've been automatically added to the waitlist.
notifications.waitlistMovedUpBody: Your position in the waitlist for {{className}} has been updated to #{{newPosition}}.
notifications.welcomeBody: Welcome {{userName}}! We're excited to have you start your Pilates journey with us.
notifications.classAssignmentCancelledBody: Your booking for {{className}} on {{date}} at {{time}} has been cancelled by {{staffName}}.{{creditRestored}}
notifications.noNotificationsMessage: You'll see notifications about your classes and subscription here
notifications.title: Notifications
notifications.subtitle: Stay updated with your classes and subscription
